description: MET-33 et al: Best 500 prepub and 594 Fennica prepub note are retained. MET-197 title: don't merge
comment: Note that 594 field drops affect only $5 FENNI/FIKKA/VIOLA and thus the field with $5 WHATEVER is retained
comment 2: Was once same as test 04 except LDR/17=8 for both records, thus best 500 prepub field is kept.
